title: 92x28: Exception to the One-Year Representational Bar ("Cooling-Off Period") of 18 U.S.C. § 207(c)
summary: Eligible former senior employees may engage in representational activities before a component of their former department or agency if that component has been designated by the Director of OGE pursuant to 18 U.S.C. § 207(h) as a separate agency or bureau within the department or agency.
